General.Name: Lander Sports Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Lander Sports Development Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate industry in China. The company sells and leases commercial real estate properties comprising office buildings. It also constructs and operates sports service complexes for various sports, such as football, basketball, tennis, fitness, physical education, and training, as well as offers services for various sports events. The company was formerly known as Lander Real Estate Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lander Sports Development Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Lander Sports Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Block D, China Overseas International Ce, Chengdu, China, 610041
